meanings.definition: The cartilaginous portion of the skull in vertebrates.
meanings.sent1: The chondrocraniums provide structure and support for the skull.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the chondrocraniums to understand vertebrate anatomy.
meanings.sent3: The chondrocraniums of the fish looked like a puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her ideas formed a chondrocranium, holding together the project.
meanings.sent5: The chondrocraniums were as essential as the foundation of a building.

meanings.sent1: In the museum, you can see various chondrocraniums on display.
meanings.sent2: The researchers compared the chondrocraniums of different species.
meanings.sent3: The chondrocraniums in the exhibit seemed to be chatting with each other.
meanings.sent4: The classroom was filled with chondrocraniums, each with its own story.
meanings.sent5: The shelves were lined with chondrocraniums, a testament to the diversity of life.
